message: I'm feeling generous, but let's make it worthwhile for both of us.
Come on, meet me in the middle!
This is my final offer.  Let's be reasonable and end this.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm still waiting for a good deal
Okay, Alice, let's be fair.  A 50/50 split is the most logical solution here.  Take it or leave it.
Your 50/50 split was a good try, but I think I deserve a bit more
